Title: Relates to stopping for a school bus on a public highway with six or more lanes
Summary: Permits passing a school bus on a public highway with six or more lanes when traveling the opposite direction of the stopped school bus while separated from such school bus by a median or permanent barrier.
LawCode: Amd ยง1174, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to stopping for a school bus on a public highway with six or more lanes
